### convertToErrorCode() {#ae72380c7e1527574b8d3af867ab9a369}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::error&#95;code llvm::coverage::CoverageMapError::convertToErrorCode () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Convert this error to a std::error&#95;code.

This is a temporary crutch to enable interaction with code still using std::error&#95;code. It will be removed in the future.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h/#l00091">91</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.
